Method Detail

synchronize

public void synchronize()
Adds this node's current, baseLevel, and residual activation to total activation. Also updates activation buffers. This method should only be invoked when activation passing for this cycle is complete.

isOverThreshold

public boolean isOverThreshold()
Determines if this node is relevant. A node is relevant if its total activation is greater or equal to the selection threshold.

Specified by:
isOverThreshold in interface PamLinkable
Returns:
true if this node is relevant
See Also:

decayBaseLevelActivation

public void decayBaseLevelActivation(long ticks)
Description copied from interface: LearnableActivatible
decay the Base Level activation using the decay strategy. The decay depends on the time since the last decaying. It is indicated by the parameter ticks.

Specified by:
decayBaseLevelActivation in interface LearnableActivatible
Parameters:
ticks - the number of ticks to decay

reinforceBaseLevelActivation

public void reinforceBaseLevelActivation(double amount)
Description copied from interface: LearnableActivatible
The Base Level activation of this node is increased using the excitation value as a parameter for the ExciteStrategy. This is primarily used for learning.

Specified by:
reinforceBaseLevelActivation in interface LearnableActivatible
Parameters:
amount - the value to be used to increase the Base Level activation of this node
